dt: {bc}any of a small genus (Oryx) of large heavily built African and Arabian antelopes that have a light-colored coat with dark conspicuous markings especially on the face {dx}compare {dxt|gemsbok||}{/dx}

et: New Latin, from Latin, a gazelle, from Greek, pickax, antelope, kind of whale, from {it}oryssein{/it} to dig; akin to Latin {it}runcare{/it} to grub up, weed, Sanskrit {it}luñcati{/it} he plucks
shortdef: any of a small genus (Oryx) of large heavily built African and Arabian antelopes that have a light-colored coat with dark conspicuous markings especially on the face
